mapper.select: SELECT CINEMA_NAME FROM CINEMA_TBL WHERE CINEMA_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{cinemaAddress} || '%'

SELECT DISTINCT M.TITLE FROM CINEMA_TBL JOIN SCREEN_TBL USING (CINEMA_NO) JOIN SHOWTIME_TBL USING (SCREEN_NO) JOIN MOVIE_TBL M USING (MOVIE_NO) WHERE CINEMA_NAME = #{cinemaName} -- AND SCREENING_STATUS = 'NOW SHOWING'
SELECT CINEMA_NAME, CINEMA_NO FROM CINEMA_TBL JOIN SCREEN_TBL USING (CINEMA_NO) JOIN SHOWTIME_TBL USING (SCREEN_NO)

SELECT s.showtime_time, sc.screen_seat, sc.screen_Name, screen_No, movie_No, m.title, cinema_no, CINEMA_NAME, s.showtime_no FROM CINEMA_TBL JOIN SCREEN_TBL sc USING (CINEMA_NO) JOIN SHOWTIME_TBL s USING (SCREEN_NO) JOIN MOVIE_TBL m USING (MOVIE_NO) where cinema_name = #{cinemaName} AND title = #{title}

SELECT r.RESERVATION_SEAT, s.SCREEN_NAME, st.SHOWTIME_TIME FROM RESERVATION_TBL r JOIN SHOWTIME_TBL st ON r.SHOWTIME_NO = st.SHOWTIME_NO JOIN SCREEN_TBL s ON st.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO where RESERVATION_DATE = #{reservationDate}
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION_TBL join PAYMENT_TBL p using (reservation_No) join movie_tbl m ON p.name = m.TITLE WHERE RESERVATION_NO=#{reservationNo}
